Summary: different lights randomly flashed on and off until i saw a Triangle
divs: Sighting Detailsfriend called told me to look to the north above mtns called san gabriel and so i did saw different lights go on and off in different places in the sky above the mtn until i saw the triangle came into view. very cool. But cant explain.
